classes.name: Warrior
classes.description: A sturdy fighter with high health and balanced offense/defense.
classes.flavorText: Warriors are masters of combat, trained in the art of sword and shield. They can withstand tremendous punishment while dealing consistent damage.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A nimble combatant with high damage but lower survivability.
classes.flavorText: Rogues strike from the shadows with deadly precision. They sacrifice durability for devastating attacks and swift movements.

classes.name: Mage
classes.description: A wielder of arcane magic with powerful spells but fragile defenses.
classes.flavorText: Mages harness the raw power of the arcane, channeling devastating magical energies. Their bodies are frail, but their spells are unmatched.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A holy warrior who can both fight and heal.
classes.flavorText: Clerics blend martial prowess with divine magic. They are versatile adventurers capable of both dealing damage and sustaining themselves.
